bug.summary: pip install pytorch-lightning["extra"] doesn't install FairScale
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The documentation [0] states that to enable sharded training one needs to install the extras packages with pip install pytorch-lightning["extra"], in my case only following the second option pip install https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/fairscale/archive/pl_1.1.0.zip actually installed fairscale. [0] <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/stable/multi_gpu.html#model-parallelism-beta>https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/stable/multi_gpu.html#model-parallelism-beta</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
pip install pytorch-lightning["extra"] <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Fairscale gets installed. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
PyTorch Version 1.7.0 OS: Linux How you installed PyTorch: pip Python version: 3.6.9 CUDA/cuDNN version: 10.2 GPU models and configuration: 4x TITAN X
